mean_en: a large meeting of people who come to a place for usually several days to talk about their shared work or other interests or to make decisions as a group
word_etyma: con一起 + ven来 + tion名词后缀 → convention 集会；会议
sentence: We met at a convention to talk about our different businesses.
sentence_trans: 我们在一场会议中见面并讨论了我们所做的不同事务。
